name: Behind the Scenes (Preview)
description:
Behind the Scenes: Movies, magic, and movie magic! 

This comedic adventure is inspired by the history of film-making, and it is a playable teaser based on my very first game design document during my time as a Writing for Film, TV & Games student at the Vancouver Film School. This is a slightly modified version of one of my first Introduction to Dialogue Design assignment.

It's a short demo, so feel free to play again as different characters and see some odd changes here and there!
